attributes.action: Approve and encourage installation of Mahtma Gandhi's Statue in Parliament Square
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mahatma Gandhi epitomises virtues of peace, resoluteness, kindness and religious harmony which are arguably more relevant today than at any time in the history of civilised society. 

He is also a big part of the history of Britain and undoubtedly deserves recognition by installing a statue in the Parliament Square.

We therefore urge the honourable Prime Minister to Approve and Encourage the installation of Mahatma Gandhi's statue in Parliament Square.
